column4: not much man. I have a situation on my hands.  I installed Ubuntu about 3 weeks ago.  I am running Gnome and it is running Compiz.  I started kde from terminal, restarted and now when the login screen comes up my keyboard, mouse, and all usb devices lock up.
Oi, you started two wms at the same time?
They'll fight over crucial files like xauthority & so on. No wonder it locked up. :\
Always kill off one wm before running the other.
